ExPel Hub
=========

xplhub is a script which uses provides an xPL hub which listens on port 3865
and distributes xPL messages to its clients. 

Version History
---------------

========  ====================================================================
Version	  Notes
========  ====================================================================
0.1       Initial release
========  ====================================================================


Source Code
-----------

The source code can be found within Launchpad at the following location
https://launchpad.net/expel
